snippet.title: Melody of the Light - Alpha trailer
snippet.description:
Melody of the Light is a metroidvania bullet hell video game. This game tells a story about a little girl wandering in a world called The Origin looking for her father, but her adventure doesn't seem easy, what fate will she meet? What's happening in The Origin?

Support and follow our update on:
https://twitter.com/HeavyNano
https://instagram.com/heavynano
https://heavynano.itch.io/motl-alpha

Music on this video:
The Duel | Thriller based trailer Music (Royalty free | Copyright free), by Lekhan
https://youtu.be/Ou_PqUwKDOg
